sources.title: The Girl In The Taxi
sources.description: The head of a Parisian purity league is found out to be anything but when his organizations mistakenly sends an award to the wrong person.

metadata.Plot: The head of a Parisian purity league is found out to be anything but when his organizations mistakenly sends an award to the wrong person.
metadata.Writer: Fritz Gottfurcht, Austin Melford, Georg Okonkowski
metadata.Actors: Frances Day, Henri Garat, Lawrence Grossmith
